card.note: Congrat's on your upcoming wedding!
card.author: Brian B

card.note: May this day you share be filled with love and laughter. May all the days ahead be happy every after!
card.author: Sonia Peterson

card.note: I am tickled pink that you two have found each other, and I wish you every happiness in the future. Emily knows about my cynicism and that being "tickled pink" over a marriage doesn't happen often with me, so take that as a great compliment!
card.author: Ian Zap...etc.

card.note: Congratulations!! Take time to enjoy your special day. I wish you a lifetime of happiness, joy, and memories.
card.author: Steve

card.note:
Emily & Matt,
Best wishes on your upcoming wedding and future together. I hope your marriage is full of a lifetime of memories!
card.author: Joe DeMarco

card.note: Congratulations!! Best wishes for you and Matt on your Wedding Day.
card.author: Mike Ruehr

card.note:
Hey Emily & Matt,
Wishing you every happiness in your marriage! Cheers.
card.author: The Auslander Family

card.note: Congratulation, Emily and Matt! Enjoy your wedding day. I wish you all the best as you start your lives together as a married couple.
card.author: Julie Becker

card.note: Emily, Wishing you & Matt a memorable Wedding Day. Best wishes for a lifetime filled with happiness and love.
card.author: Janet Blumenthal

card.note: Emily and Matt, Congrats! Enjoy your day and best wishes!
card.author: Paul P.

card.note: Enjoy your wedding, honeymoon and the beginning of your lives together.
card.author: Darren

card.note: Emily and Matt - Congratulations and best wishes to you on your wedding day! Enjoy each moment since the day will be here before you know it. Also, have a great time in Europe and London in particular. Be sure to go to Harrod's and bring us back some real Earl Grey tea!
card.author: Bob Heinrichs

card.note: Congratulations and Best Wishes for a beautiful and a memorable day. May you always make time for each other and may your love grow and last a life time.
card.author: Pat Geary

card.note: Dear Emily and Matt, Congratulations and best wishes for a long and happy life together.
card.author: Audrey

card.note: Wishing both of you a world of happiness and joy on your wedding day. Best of Everything!
card.author: Carol Lalli

card.note:
Emily & Matt,
I hope you have a wonderful wedding and wish you a long and happy life together. And make sure to spend some quiet moments together on your wedding day.
card.author: Jeff M.

card.note:
Congratulations to you both. Be good to each other.
They recommended sharing cooking tips - learn to use a slow cooker. It is hard to go wrong and the rewards are huge.
card.author: Andrew John

card.note: Congratulations and best wishes for many years of happiness!
card.author: Eric Shulenberger

card.note: Some people ask the secret of our long marriage. We take time to go to a restaurant two times a week. A little candlelight, dinner, soft music and dancing. She goes Tuesdays, I go Fridays. - Henry Youngman
card.author: Ari

card.note: Emily, congratulations! Hope the wedding is wonderful and you both have a fantastic life together. :)
card.author: Tommy

card.note: Congrats Emily! Hope you have a great day!
card.author: Rob Lazaroff

card.note: Congratulations! Hope you have the best day ever!
card.author: Justin Klunder

card.note: Emily, Wishing you and Matt a lifetime of happiness! Enjoy your day and take a moment to step back and take it all in. Congrats!
card.author: Kate Davis

card.note: Congratulations to both you and Matt!!!!!
card.author: Joanne

card.note:
Emily & Matt,
I wish you two the very best. I hope you enjoy your special day and have a wonderful life together.
card.author: Jessica

card.note: Congrats Emily and Matt! I am so happy for you and hope your wedding day is the first of many more happy occasions to come!
card.author: Jared

card.note: Emily and Matt, Congratulations and best wishes for your wedding day and your future together!
card.author: Tom M.

card.note:
Congratulations, Emily!
I bet you will be burpie-ing all the way down the aisle.
card.author: Jack Gunn

card.note: My wife married for my candied walnuts: 1/4 cup powder sugar 1/8 tsp cayenne 1/8 tsp salt 1 cup walnuts 1 tsp cinnamon 1) heat oven to 350 2) blanch nuts in pan for 3 min 3) toss nuts in spice mix 4) spread on pan on parchment paper & bake 10 min.
card.author: Matt Taylor

card.note: Emily, Congratulations on such a wonderful and exciting next stage. I am sure you will bring the same patience, generosity and wisdom to your marriage as you graciously share with all of us at the office. God bless!
card.author: Jeannette Grabe

card.note: Emily and Matt we are all so excited for you! Emily we know you will be beautiful and cannot wait to see your pictures! Congratulations!
card.author: Marilyn

card.note: Congratulations from San Francisco! Wishing you a lovely and joyous wedding day.
card.author: Chris Brown (not the rapper)

card.note: Congrats Emily & Matt
card.author: Jon Malloy

card.note: To a life filled with love, laughter and fun. Congratulations!
card.author: Justin

card.note:
Best wishes to the Mr. and Mrs.
Wishing you much happiness!
card.author: Mandy Savitsky

card.note: Emily & Matt, Congratulations on your marriage and best wishes for a beautiful future together filled with love, happiness and laughter.
card.author: Kathy Bowen

card.note: Congratulations, and enjoy the wedding day, as it flies by!
card.author: Fred

card.note: Congrats & Best Wishes!
card.author: Mike

card.note:
Dear Emily & Matt,
Congratulations and best of luck on this new and exciting stage in your lives! Here's wishing you lots of laughs and a long and happy life together.
card.author: John Turcik

card.note: Wishing you both all the best---Health, happiness and good fortune.
card.author: John S

card.note: Emily & Matt, Congratulations to you both on your wedding day. All the best to you!
card.author: Matt Jahnle

card.note: Congratulations Emily & Matt! Wishing you the best on your big day. Enjoy every moment and may you have a lifetime of health & happiness!
card.author: Regina

card.note: Congratulations and best wishes. Enjoy your special day.
card.author: Bob S.

card.note: Mazel Tov. Jane's first original recipe. Place 4 cups of water in a sauce pan and heat on high until bubbles form in rapid succession. Voila. A real crowd pleaser.
card.author: Michael Stolper

card.note: Emily & Matt, Wishing you a wonderful journey filled with love, happiness and success, as you embark on this next chapter in your life together! Congratulations!!!
card.author: Matea Dujmusic

card.note: Congratulations Emily & Matt!! Wishing you both a lifetime of happiness!
card.author: Crystal Archambo

card.note: Emily and Matt, I wish you the very best and lifetime filled with happiness. My advice is to keep things in perspective and let all of the little things go. Enjoy your day and cherish every moment.
card.author: Kate Duffy

card.note:
Dear E &M,
Getting to know you both over the past couple years has been a joy and a privilege. ELB, you are an awesome coworker and I feel blessed (sorry...) to work with you. M, we need to hang out more often. Best wishes to you both for a happy and enduring marriage!
card.author: Mike

card.note: Congratulations! Wishing you all the best for a wonderful future together. Enjoy your wedding celebration!
card.author: Brett Cohen

card.note:
Emily & Matt,
I am so excited for you guys. Wishing you both a lifetime of happiness next to the one you love.
card.author: Anna

card.note:
Emily & Matt,
The best things in life are meant to be shared. Wishing you both many years of happiness! Congratulations!!
card.author: Brett Rubinson

card.note:
Emily & Matt, Wishing you a joy filled wedding day! May it be just the start of a lifetime of love, laughter, and wonderful memories.
Kindness and patience go far.
Best wishes!!!
card.author: Alexandra
